title: learn each champs potential
body: i realized the other day....people dont know how to exploit their champs strengths..... we had a top lane talon against a nasus, and he just hugged turret cus he said he was scared of nasus....i agree that later i the game, nasus will S*** on talon, but early game use ur advantage! u have a ranged w to harass nasus when hes going for farm. look @ when ur minions are low and position urself to harass EVERY TIME! nasus loves stacks and hell gladly take harass for a stack, but youll eventually bully him out of lane or at least make him think twice if that one cs is worth the health.... that was more of a vague example, but you get my point.. some champs cant do shit until a certain level/item...exploit that weakness! if ur a caitlyn, poke vayne as much as you can b4 she reaches 6! ur against a vlad? force him to spam his e to lower his health, then all in him when he realizes hes not hitting you and lets his stacks go! in bronze and silver elo, that really is enough to climb. know what your champ can do at each level, and what the enemy can do. im sure all of you have used most of the champs by know, and even if you didnt master them, u have an idea of how they work! idk....just needed to rant. hope this helps.

replies.body: i at least want people to know this before they que for ranked! i read so many posts where people say they play ranked to improve but they know they suck.....the least they can do is know this
One of the most low elo player mistake is they are scared to show dominance because they always think that the enemy is much stronger than they are.
